name: Honey Garlic Shrimp & Broccoli
preparation: Preheat oven to 425Â° F. Line two 1⁄4 Sheet Pans with 1⁄4 Sheet Pan Liners.
In a large bowl, whisk together half the seasoning (about 1⁄3 cup), oil, and water. It will be thick. Add broccoli and toss to coat.  Place on one pan, bake 18 min, or until tender crisp.
Meanwhile, in a bowl, whisk egg. In another bowl, combine remaining seasoning and breadcrumbs.
Working in batches, dip shrimp into egg, then dredge in breadcrumbs, pressing firmly.
Spread out on remaining pan; bake 10 min until coating is golden and shrimp are cooked.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄2 cup baked fries and 2 tbsp of your favourite Epicure dip.
